sqlMap.select: SELECT A.STAMPID, A.FID, A.SID, A.STAMPTITLE, A.THEME, A.ISDELETE, A.SAVEDATE, A.EDITDATE, A.STARTDATE, A.ENDDATE, B.STAMPCOUNT, B.EVENTDAY, B.TITLE FROM PLACESTAMP A INNER JOIN PSTAMPTYPE B ON A.SID =B.SID WHERE A.FID = #fid# AND A.ISDELETE ='N' ORDER BY STARTDATE DESC
SELECT sql_calc_found_rows SID, TITLE, STAMPCOUNT, EVENTDAY, REMARK, DISPSEQ, EDITDATE, ISDELETE FROM PSTAMPTYPE WHERE SID = #sid#
SELECT sql_calc_found_rows SID, TITLE, STAMPCOUNT, EVENTDAY, REMARK, DISPSEQ, EDITDATE, ISDELETE FROM PSTAMPTYPE ORDER BY $sortColumn$ $sortDirection$ LIMIT #startRow# , #endRow#
SELECT SID, TITLE, STAMPCOUNT, EVENTDAY, REMARK, DISPSEQ, EDITDATE, ISDELETE FROM PSTAMPTYPE ORDER BY DISPSEQ ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSTAMPTYPE(TITLE, STAMPCOUNT, EVENTDAY, REMARK, DISPSEQ, SAVEDATE) VALUES(#title#, #stampcount#, #eventday#, #remark#, #dispseq#, now() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PSTAMPTYPE SET TITLE =#title#, STAMPCOUNT =#stampcount#, EVENTDAY = #eventday#, REMARK = #remark#, DISPSEQ =#dispseq#, ISDELETE = #isDelete# WHERE SID =#sid#
